name: Mission Prevalence
definition: Prevalence of the mission essential functions

values.name: Minimal
values.definition: Neither Support nor Essential apply. The vulnerable component may be used within the entities, but it is not used as a mission-essential component, nor does it provide impactful support to mission-essential functions.

values.name: Support
values.definition: The vulnerable component only supports MEFs for two or more entities.

values.name: Essential
values.definition: The vulnerable component directly provides capabilities that constitute at least one MEF for at least one entity; component failure may (but does not necessarily) lead to overall mission failure.
